quizzes.question: Which two choices indicate optional values for the box-shadow?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Blur and Spread[/h1]

Besides color, there are also two optional values for the box-shadow element, which are [b]blur [/b]and [b]spread[/b]. 
[note]The blur and spread values should be used before the color value. [/note]
[code format="css" codeId="584"]box-shadow: 10px 10px 5px 5px #888888;[/code]
[b]Result:[/b] [img id="2670" width="100%"]

quizzes.question: Place the box-shadow property values in the correct order.
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Negative Values[/h1]

[b]Negative values[/b] can also be used for the box-shadow property.

[b]horizontal offset[/b] - the shadow will be to the [b]left [/b]of the box
[b]vertical offset[/b] - the shadow will be [b]above [/b]the box
[b]blur radius[/b] - negative values are [b]not allowed[/b]
[b]spread radius[/b] - negative values will cause the shadow to [b]shrink[/b]

[b]For example:[/b][code format="css" codeId="585"]box-shadow: [b]-10px[/b] [b]-10px[/b] 5px [b]-5px[/b] #888888;[/code]
[b]Result:[/b] [img id="2671" width="100%"]
